headline: BofA Sees Opportunities Ahead For General Dynamics Corporation (GD)’s Combat Systems and Technologies Segments
summary: General Dynamics Corporation (NYSE:GD) is among the top 8 defense stocks based on ChatGPT’s advice. On October 28, BofA analyst Ronald Epstein lifted the price target for the stock to $400 from $370 and reaffirmed a Buy rating on its shares.
